casebody.data:
CAPT. CHANCE, INC., Leonard Shrimp Producers, Inc., St. Paul Fire & Marine Insurance Co., Zurich American Insurance Co., Great American Insurance Company of New York, Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. UNITED STATES of America, Defendant-Appellee. No. 07-13702. United States Court of Appeals, Eleventh Circuit. April 30, 2008. Carl R. Nelson, Eric Christopher Thiel, Fowler, White, Boggs, Banker P.A., Tampa, FL, for Plaintiffs-Appellants. Bruce Allan Ross, Washington, DC, for Defendant-Appellee.

Before BIRCH and DUBINA, Circuit Judges, and GOLDBERG,* Judge.

Honorable Richard W. Goldberg, United States Court of International Trade Judge, sitting by designation.

 PER CURIAM:

Having carefully reviewed the briefs of the parties and the record and having heard oral argument in this case, we hereby affirm the thorough and well-reasoned opinion of the district court.

AFFIRMED.
